00059 /* Creation flags */
00060 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00061 
00062 /* Status flags */
00063 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00064 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00065 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00066 #define XNSCHED  0x00000010     /* Pod needs rescheduling */
00067 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00068 #define XNKCOUT  0x00000040     /* Kernel callout context */
00069 
00070 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00071 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00072 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00073 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00074 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00075 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00076 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00077 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00078 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00079 
00080 /* Flags for context checking */
00081 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00082 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00083 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00084 
00085 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00086 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00087 
00088 /* Error codes thrown by the POD management routines */
00089 #define XNPOD_ERRBASE  0xffff1000
00090 
00091 #define XNERR_POD_NOMEM   (XNPOD_ERRBASE + 1)
00092 #define XNERR_POD_BUSY    (XNPOD_ERRBASE + 2)
00093 #define XNERR_POD_UNINIT  (XNPOD_ERRBASE + 3)
00094 #define XNERR_POD_NOHOOK  (XNPOD_ERRBASE + 4)
00095 
00096 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         0  /* i.e. Use XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK */
00097 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00098 
00099 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (128 * 1024)
00100 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00101 #define XNPOD_RUNPRI    0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00102 
00103 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00104 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00105 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00106 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00107 
00108 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00109 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)
00110 
00111 /* Kernel debugger priority == max_std_prio + 999 */
00112 #define XNPOD_KDEBUG_PRIO_BASE ((nkpod)->kdbg_prio_base)
00113 
00114 /* Idle svc thread priority == min_std_prio - 2 */
00115 #define XNPOD_ISVC_PRIO_IDLE     ((nkpod)->isvc_prio_idle)
00116 
00117 /* max_std_prio + 1 <= prio < max_std_prio + max_irq_prio + 1 */
00118 #define XNPOD_ISVC_PRIO_BASE(iprio) \
00119 xnpod_get_maxprio(nkpod,iprio + 1)

00153 typedef struct xnpod {

00206 void xnpod_schedule_runnable(xnthread_t *thread,
00207                              int flags);

00209 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod) {
00210     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00211     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00212 }
00213 
00214 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr) {
00215     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00216         pod->minpri + incr :
00217         pod->minpri - incr;
00218 }
00219 
00220 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr) {
00221     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00222         pod->maxpri - incr :
00223         pod->maxpri + incr;
00224 }
00225 
00226 static inline int xnpod_get_relprio (int aprio) {
00227     /* Returns a normalized 0-based relative priority value computed
00228        from a skin-based absolute priority level. */
00229     int delta = aprio - nkpod->minpri;
00230     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00231 }
00232 
00233 static inline int xnpod_get_absprio (int rprio) {
00234     /* Returns a normalized absolute skin-based priority value
00235        computed from a relative 0-based priority level. */
00236     int aprio = xnpod_get_minprio(nkpod,rprio);
00237 
00238     if (testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO))
00239         return aprio < nkpod->maxpri ? nkpod->maxpri : aprio;
00240 
00241     return aprio > nkpod->maxpri ? nkpod->maxpri : aprio;
00242 }
00243 
00244 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio) {
00245     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00246        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00247     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00248     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00249 }
00250 
00251 static inline void xnpod_renice_isvc (xnthread_t *thread, int prio) {
00252 
00253     spl_t s;
00254 
00255     splhigh(s);
00256     thread->cprio = prio;
00257     xnpod_schedule_runnable(thread,XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO);
00258     splexit(s);
00259 }
00260 
00261 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio) {
00262 
00263     spl_t s;
00264 
00265     splhigh(s);
00266     nkpod->sched.rootcb.cprio = prio;
00267     xnpod_schedule_runnable(&nkpod->sched.rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00268     splexit(s);
00269 }

00273 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00274 (&nkpod->sched)
00275 
00276 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00277 (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00278 
00279 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00280 (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNKCOUT))
00281 
00282 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00283 (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00284 
00285 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00286 (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00287 
00288 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00289 (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00290 
00291 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00292 (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00293 
00294 #define xnpod_pendable_p() \
00295 (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK)))
00296 
00297 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00298     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00299 
00300 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00301     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00302 
00303 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00304     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00305 
00306 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00307 
00308 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00309 (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00311 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void) {
00312     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00313 }
00314 
00315 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00316     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00317     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00318 }
00319 
00320 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2time (xnticks_t ticks) {
00321     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00322     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00323 }
00324 
00325 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_time2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00326     unsigned long r;
00327     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),&r);
00328 }

00388 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void) {
00389 
00390     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00391     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00392     setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00393 }
00394 
00395 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void) {
00396 
00397     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00398         {
00399         clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00400 
00401         if (testbits(nkpod->status,XNSCHED))
00402             xnpod_schedule(NULL);
00403         }
00404 }

00435 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00436     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00437     xnpod_schedule(NULL);
00438 }

00440 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00441     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL,NULL);
00442 }
00443 
00444 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (struct xnmutex *imutex) {
00445     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL,imutex);
00446 }
00447 
00448 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (struct xnmutex *imutex) {
00449     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),imutex);
00450 }
